title: Robust Anomaly Detection through Multi-Modal Autoencoder Fusion for Small Vehicle Damage Detection
summary: Wear and tear detection in fleet and shared vehicle systems is a critical challenge, particularly in rental and car-sharing services, where minor damage, such as dents, scratches, and underbody impacts, often goes unnoticed or is detected too late. Currently, manual inspection methods are the default approach, but are labour-intensive and prone to human error.
